description: This file contains integration tests for a multimedia AI agent, testing image and audio input processing, including fetching audio data, running the agent with different input modalities, and verifying the output and metrics.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the AI agent that processes multimedia inputs and generates responses.

classes.name: Audio
classes.description: Represents an audio input, either as raw content or via URL.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image input with a URL.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat-based models.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: _get_audio_input
methods.description: Fetches an example audio file from a URL and returns its content.

methods.name: test_image_input
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to process an image input and verify the response contains expected content.

methods.name: test_audio_input_bytes
methods.description: Tests processing of audio input provided as raw bytes.

methods.name: test_audio_input_url
methods.description: Tests processing of audio input provided via URL.

methods.name: test_audio_tokens
methods.description: Verifies that audio tokens are correctly populated and included in response metrics.
